__contactform_email_subject__: New message from your contact form
__contactform_emailconfig_missing__: You must configure your email settings to be able to send emails directly from the contact form block. If you not want sending emails, then just enable to option to give the user a direct email button instead of contact form.
__contactform_message_sent__: Thank you for your message, it has been successfully submitted
__contactform_pageblocks_contactform_def: The default e-mail text that get's suggested to the user
The default e-mail sibject that get's suggested to the user
__contactform_pageblocks_contactform_des: A contact form, where users can contact you. You can choose between a simple 'Send me a message' button or a full form with predefined text fields.
__contactform_pageblocks_contactform_ema: Your e-mail where the contact form will send to
